page.title: 09GOVERNMENT
page.content: {SIR PETER HORDERN}IS THE MP FOR AN AREA COVERING THE LAND BETWEEN UPPER BEEDING,AMBERLY,RUSPER,RUDGEWICK.THE GOVERNMENT GET THE MONEY FROM TAXES.HE HAS BEEN A MEMBER OF PARLIAMENT FOR 20 YEAR AND HE MEETS WITH OTHER MPS AT WESTMINSTER.{MRS.E.GREEN}HAS BEEN ON THE COUNTY COUNCIL FOR 2 MONTHS.1194 PEOPLE VOTED FOR MRS.E.GREEN. THERE IS A VOTE EVERY 4 YEARS.THE MAIN JOB OF MRS.E.GREEN IS TO HELP THE PEOPLE IN THE AREA SHE REPRESENTS.{MR.DRIVER}HAS BEEN A MEMBER OFTHE COUNTY COUNCIL FOR 2 YEARS.MR.DRIVER GOT 1001 VOTES AND 3 PEOPLE STOOD AGAINST HIM.{MR.LARDENER} REPRESENTS 20 SQUARE MILES OF LAND.HE IS CHAIRMAN OF THE PARISH COUNCIL.HE HAS REPRESENTED THE AREA FOR 10 YEARS. THEY HAVE AN ELECTION EVERY 4 YEARS.HE KEEPS IN TOUCH WITH SOUTHWATER BY HAVING MEETINGS.
